strapiPost.title: Amazeum To Host Its 7th Birthday Party
strapiPost.content:
The Scott Family Amazeum is celebrating its 7th birthday on Friday (July 15) all day long, and you’re invited! 

  • A wool party: The birthday theme is based on the traditional seventh-anniversary gift of wool, so guests can experience a variety of pop-up activities like felting, finger knitting, and painting with yarn. And for extra holly fun, the Amazeum will host the Barn Yard Buddies Petting Zoo and demonstrations from the NWA Weavers Guild. 
  • For everyone: The Amazeum is part children’s museum, part science center, and part maker space, providing experiences designed for adults as well as children and families. All the birthday activities on Friday will be included with general admission to the museum.
